title: John  Deere's Shocking Tactic Robs Farmers Billions Every Year!

tasks.task: Imagine a farmer dealing with a malfunctioning tractor on a crucial day of harvest.
subtasks: The farmer checks the fuel filters as a first step to troubleshooting the tractor's problem.
The farmer calls a John Deere mechanic upon realizing the issue extends beyond basic maintenance.
The mechanic advises connecting specialized diagnostic equipment to retrieve error codes.
The farmer grapples with the implications of relying on proprietary technology and corporate repair monopolies.

tasks.task: Discuss the broader implications of repair monopolies in agriculture.
subtasks: Explore the financial impact on farmers who must rely on dealership services for repairs.
Highlight the case of Joe, a fourth-generation Iowa farmer, facing significant financial loss due to a delayed tractor repair.
Examine the shift in modern agricultural machinery, which now integrates complex software requiring specialized expertise.
Analyze the antitrust lawsuits filed against John Deere challenging the legality of their repair monopolies.
Investigate state-level right-to-repair legislation, such as Colorado's law requiring manufacturers to provide diagnostic tools to independent repair shops.
Evaluate federal government actions, including executive orders and policy statements supporting repair rights.
Contrast the right-to-repair movement in agriculture with similar battles in the automotive industry.
Discuss the implications of data control in the context of agricultural technology and the industry's efforts to maintain monopolistic practices.

tasks.task: Advocate for the right to repair in agriculture and call for collective action.
subtasks: Encourage support for existing initiatives and ongoing legal battles.
Promote consumer awareness and education on the importance of repair rights.
Highlight the potential broader impact of right-to-repair victories beyond agriculture.
Empower viewers to take action through comments and engagement with relevant movements.
